npm-publish-scripts

Usage:
    npm-publish-scripts [command] [options]

Commands:

    init
    serve [<path of project>]
    publish-release [<patch | minor | major>] [<stable | beta | alpha>]
    publish-docs [<path to build reference docs into>]

Options

    -h --help       Show this help text.
    -v --version    Show current version of npm-publish-scripts
